forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. Northeast wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
As the sun prepares to rise over Downtown San Francisco, a hush blankets the city. The night sky remains mostly clear, offering a tranquil backdrop that heralds the morning's arrival. The cool embrace of temperatures around 45 degrees gently stirs the air, setting the stage for a bright and sunny day. With a whispering northeast wind meandering at a leisurely pace, one can almost sense the city exhale as it readies itself for activity.

Wednesday unfolds under the watchful eye of the sun, promising a high near 60 degrees that will comfortably settle into the afternoon with a slight drop to the mid-50s. The clarity of the day is striking—there’s no fog to obscure the iconic sights, allowing one to bask in the full beauty of the city, with landmarks standing proud against a vibrant backdrop. For those venturing out, a light layer will suffice, perfect for enjoying leisurely strolls, perhaps meandering through the Presidio or savoring a warm beverage at an outdoor café. The absence of the marine layer enhances today’s allure, inviting both residents and visitors to embrace the stillness before the bustle picks up. It is a day to appreciate the simple joy of being enveloped in the crisp air, letting the fleeting moments pass by like the soft waves lapping at the bay.
